{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.8M in 2021-2022** on contracts with MAISON CROSS ROADS DE LA SOCIETE.

Across 4 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 4 have at least one amendment (100%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 164% and the average number of amendments was 2.75. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$7.9M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 2.79 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$3.1M. The longest contract was 4.17 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$4.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< /details >}}
